titles.title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to exclude the Preble's Meadow Jumping Mouse from lists of endangered species and threatened species published under that Act.
To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to exclude the Preble's Meadow Jumping Mouse from lists of endangered species and threatened species published under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from including the Preble's Meadow Jumping Mouse in any list of endangered or threatened species.
